name: Dr. Umbrella (and his robot) in the Time Machine
name_original: Dr. Umbrella (and his robot) in the Time Machine
description:
Dr. Umbrella is an inventor, who has built a time machine. With his robot he travels to different times and scenarios where he must get the fuel necessary to run the time machine and return to his time ... but along the way he will find different obstacles to overcome in order to return home safe and sound.

Are you ready to help Dr. Umbrella and bring him home?

NOTE: This is a game prototype under development published for feedback. Tested only on HTC Vive.
